description.narrative: The project development objective is to improve the condition and quality of sections along M-03 highway, and increase road safety throughout Ukraine.

condition.narrative: Borrower shall ... prepare ... annual consolidated Project Report and forecast plan every year in March.
In first year of project, the Borrower shall engage an external audit firm to prepare operational audit report.
